# Load Data

```{julia}
using RDatasets, DataFrames

# Breast Cancer dataset
data = dataset("mlbench", "BreastCancer")
first(data, 5)

include("smc.jl")
include("dataset.jl")

# Example: Run annealed SMC function
results = run_annealed_smc(data)
results

using Plots
plot(results[:trace])
```
